[blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [BlockDragger](./blockly.blockdragger_class.md)

## BlockDragger class

Class for a block dragger. It moves blocks around the workspace when they are being dragged by a mouse or touch.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class BlockDragger implements IBlockDragger 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [IBlockDragger](./blockly.iblockdragger_interface.md)

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(block, workspace)](./blockly.blockdragger_class._constructor__1_constructor.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>BlockDragger</code> class |

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [draggedConnectionManager\_](./blockly.blockdragger_class.draggedconnectionmanager__property.md) | <code>protected</code> | InsertionMarkerManager |  |
|  [draggingBlock\_](./blockly.blockdragger_class.draggingblock__property.md) | <code>protected</code> | [BlockSvg](./blockly.blocksvg_class.md) | The top block in the stack that is being dragged. |
|  [dragIconData\_](./blockly.blockdragger_class.dragicondata__property.md) | <code>protected</code> | IconPositionData\[\] |  |
|  [startXY\_](./blockly.blockdragger_class.startxy__property.md) | <code>protected</code> | [Coordinate](./blockly.utils_namespace.coordinate_class.md) |  |
|  [workspace\_](./blockly.blockdragger_class.workspace__property.md) | <code>protected</code> | [WorkspaceSvg](./blockly.workspacesvg_class.md) | The workspace on which the block is being dragged. |
|  [wouldDeleteBlock\_](./blockly.blockdragger_class.woulddeleteblock__property.md) | <code>protected</code> | boolean | Whether the block would be deleted if dropped immediately. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [disconnectBlock\_(healStack, currentDragDeltaXY)](./blockly.blockdragger_class.disconnectblock__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Disconnects the block and moves it to a new location. |
|  [drag(e, currentDragDeltaXY)](./blockly.blockdragger_class.drag_1_method.md) |  | Execute a step of block dragging, based on the given event. Update the display accordingly. |
|  [dragIcons\_(dxy)](./blockly.blockdragger_class.dragicons__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Move all of the icons connected to this drag. |
|  [endDrag(e, currentDragDeltaXY)](./blockly.blockdragger_class.enddrag_1_method.md) |  | Finish a block drag and put the block back on the workspace. |
|  [fireDragEndEvent\_()](./blockly.blockdragger_class.firedragendevent__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Fire a UI event at the end of a block drag. |
|  [fireDragStartEvent\_()](./blockly.blockdragger_class.firedragstartevent__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Fire a UI event at the start of a block drag. |
|  [fireMoveEvent\_()](./blockly.blockdragger_class.firemoveevent__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Fire a move event at the end of a block drag. |
|  [getInsertionMarkers()](./blockly.blockdragger_class.getinsertionmarkers_1_method.md) |  | Get a list of the insertion markers that currently exist. Drags have 0, 1, or 2 insertion markers. |
|  [getNewLocationAfterDrag\_(currentDragDeltaXY)](./blockly.blockdragger_class.getnewlocationafterdrag__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Calculates the drag delta and new location values after a block is dragged. |
|  [maybeDeleteBlock\_()](./blockly.blockdragger_class.maybedeleteblock__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | May delete the dragging block, if allowed. If <code>this.wouldDeleteBlock_</code> is not true, the block will not be deleted. This should be called at the end of a block drag. |
|  [pixelsToWorkspaceUnits\_(pixelCoord)](./blockly.blockdragger_class.pixelstoworkspaceunits__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Convert a coordinate object from pixels to workspace units, including a correction for mutator workspaces. This function does not consider differing origins. It simply scales the input's x and y values. |
|  [shouldDisconnect\_(healStack)](./blockly.blockdragger_class.shoulddisconnect__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Whether or not we should disconnect the block when a drag is started. |
|  [startDrag(currentDragDeltaXY, healStack)](./blockly.blockdragger_class.startdrag_1_method.md) |  | Start dragging a block. This includes moving it to the drag surface. |
|  [updateBlockAfterMove\_(delta)](./blockly.blockdragger_class.updateblockaftermove__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Updates the necessary information to place a block at a certain location. |
|  [updateCursorDuringBlockDrag\_()](./blockly.blockdragger_class.updatecursorduringblockdrag__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Update the cursor (and possibly the trash can lid) to reflect whether the dragging block would be deleted if released immediately. |
|  [updateToolboxStyle\_(isEnd)](./blockly.blockdragger_class.updatetoolboxstyle__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Adds or removes the style of the cursor for the toolbox. This is what changes the cursor to display an x when a deletable block is held over the toolbox. |
